new_posts.title: Selectively showing "act on your behalf" warning for GitHub Apps is in public preview
new_posts.summary:
Today we’ve released an update to the consent page to be less alarming when using GitHub Apps only as a form of sign-in. The consent page for GitHub Apps, where…

new_posts.title: Controlling who can request apps for your organization is now generally available
new_posts.summary: Organizations now have more granular control over who can request GitHub Apps and OAuth apps. This enhancement helps you implement stricter governance policies while maintaining flexibility for you

new_posts.title: Want better AI outputs? Try context engineering.
new_posts.summary:
Learn how custom instructions, reusable prompts, and custom agents help GitHub Copilot deliver more accurate results.

new_posts.title: Deprecation of user to organization account transformation
new_posts.summary: As of January 12, 2026, we’re deprecating the ability to convert a personal user account directly into an organization. You can now use the Move work flow to selectively migrate…
